jd:
Hi, This is Harshini from Yochana IT Solutions, I Recently found your resume in one of our Job portal and We are looking for “Sr. Data Engineer/Architect at Illinois (Onsite)” with one of our client, I have included the job information below, If you are interested, please share your updated resume.

Sr. Data Engineer/Architect
Illinois (Onsite)
12 months+

Mandatory required skills: SSIS and SQL
Preferred/Desired skills: Python

Job Description:
Prefer resource based out of US .(Any location in US) / Proficiency with ETL and Python technologies
Good exposure to design and coordinating with all stakeholders
Able to communicate Design deliverables effectively with stakeholders
Having work experience in Claims Management (P&C) is preferred

Thanks & Regards
Harshini Gadam
Yochana IT Solutions Inc
23000 Commerce Drive, Farmington Hills, MI 48335
Email id harshini@yochana.com
